articles.description: Cher has filed for temporary legal conservatorship of her adult son Elijah Blue Allman, citing his alleged recent substance abuse issues.
articles.content:
Cher has filed for temporary legal conservatorship of her adult son Elijah Blue Allman, citing his alleged ongoing substance abuse issues.
